name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Gmail Tab Resizer - Resize/Hide Promo, Forum, Social, Updates Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Gmail, Make the promo, social or other tabs smaller so that if they are not that important they don't take up so much space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Gmail, Make the promo, social or other tabs smaller so that if they are not that important they don't take up so much space. If too much spam in promo, you can hide it completely.
